name: Away From Earth: Moon
description: The world is in danger. Our water is running out. Our world is running out. As a player, you need to make moon as livable and invite humans from world to moon. By doing that, you need to use your engineer abilities to make water&electric systems of Moon.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 64 Bit, Windows 8.1 64 Bit, Windows 8 64 Bit, Windows 7 64 Bit Service Pack 1 Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad CPU Q6600 @ 2.40GHz (4 CPUs) / AMD Phenom 9850 Quad-Core Processor (4 CPUs) @ 2.5GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 660 / AMD GPU Radeon HD 7870 DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Any
